title: NFL Draft Predictions + Upside QB Picks - Fantasy Football Podcast for 4/28
description:
NFL Draft Day is here! The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike and Jason predict landing spots for the top fantasy rookies! Plus, favorite late round QBs for the 2022 fantasy football season, Melvin Gordon is back with the Broncos, and more! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for April 28th, 2022.

The 2022 UDK is available for pre-order at UltimateDraftKit.com -- Get instant access to the Dynasty Pass with the UDK+

(05:05) - Favorite Late Round QBs
(09:35) - NFL News (Melvin Gordon / Javonte Williams)
(15:05) - NFL Draft Predictions
(17:30) - Quarterbacks
(17:30) - Malik Willis
(20:00) - Kenny Pickett
(21:00) - Desmond Ridder
(23:05) - Running Backs
(23:25) - Breece Hall
(25:15) - Kenneth Walker III
(27:35) - Wide Receivers
(28:10) - Garrett Wilson
(30:15) - Drake London
(30:45) - Jameson Williams
(31:40) - Chris Olave
(32:50) - Treylon Burks
(33:50) - Jahan Dotson
(34:55) - Skyy Moore
(36:15) - George Pickens
(37:05) - Christian Watson
(39:00) - Tight End
(39:00) - Trey McBride
(40:40) - Mailbag

Connect with the show:

Follow on Instagram
